lenders.name: Deb
lenders.loan_because: I think it is important to help people to become independant and self sufficient. I have been fortunate in my life and I want to help other people find that same good fortune.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Director at a very large telecommunications company. I head a team that manages large, strategic projects in North America and other parts of the world as we expand our business.

lenders.name: Maren + Carsten + Ben
lenders.loan_because:
Things do not change, we do.
(Henry David Thoreau)
lenders.occupational_info: Maren is into sustainable tourism, Carsten works with cameras & computers and Ben loves to tame dinosaurs.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: It's important to remember that we all need assistance and support.  All of our dreams and aspirations can be realized with the aid of a community, whether near or far.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in the process of launching an initiative to help manufacturers move excess product in an efficient and discreet manner, thereby providing positive opportunities for home decor buyers and enthusiasts.

lenders.name: Roberta
lenders.loan_because: I want to help!
lenders.occupational_info: Rehabilitation for people severely burned

lenders.name: Danielle
lenders.loan_because: I would like to do my small part in helping people in this world who would greatly appeciate a chance to have someone give them this opportunity of a life time.
lenders.occupational_info: As a student I get up in the morning around 6:00am and travel to my classes. I end my classes and studies around 8:30pm. I do this Monday to Fri. I then have a partime job on the weekends to pay for my education costs

lenders.name: Cindi
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of sick, injured and newborn animals who don't have homes.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: Microcredit is good for the world!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a laser lab.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people reach their goals in life.

lenders.name: Mutual Benefit Society
lenders.loan_because: When one of our card playing friends, Jack McCoy, died a few years ago, we created Jack's Jar in which the winner of every hand puts in 25 cents. When the amount gets large, we've donated it to a worthy cause. Now we think Jack would like us to bet on others' dreams for the future.
lenders.occupational_info: We're educators, car salespersons, bankers, psychologists, computer managers, and everyone is a poker player.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I like to help start up businesses get up and running.
lenders.occupational_info: I like to give back because God has been so good to me!

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because:
" If I can help out people then I   should".
I have been to Mexico and have seen poverty and wished I could have helped out in some way. This is my small portion of help to the world.

lenders.name: John
lenders.occupational_info: I work with sports clubs and help them market themselves better. Through this I help make sport more fun, easy and popular and get more people playing sport.

lenders.name: BGB
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves to go to bed with a full belly.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: marty
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good to see others have success.

lenders.name: Lindsey
lenders.loan_because: I can help others.

lenders.name: Anthony
lenders.loan_because: “If among you, one of your brothers should become poor, in any of your towns within your land that the Lord your God is giving you, you shall not harden your heart or shut your hand against your poor brother, but you shall open your hand to him and lend him sufficient for his need, whatever it may be. Take care lest there be an unworthy thought in your heart and you say, ‘The seventh year, the year of release is near,’ and your eye look grudgingly on your poor brother, and you give him nothing, and he cry to the Lord against you, and you be guilty of sin. You shall give to him freely, and your heart shall not be grudging when you give to him, because for this the Lord your God will bless you in all your work and in all that you undertake. For there will never cease to be poor in the land. Therefore I command you, ‘You shall open wide your hand to your brother, to the needy and to the poor, in your land.’" (Deuteronomy 15:7-11)
lenders.occupational_info: I am an accountant and business partner of Pauwela Cafe and Bakery in Haiku, Maui, Hawaii.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop computer software that makes it easier for people to access and share information.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: I love helping people who want to work and help themselves.  I feel fullfilled in giving others a bit of help that they can make good use of and maybe even do more!
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find their best fit of work and volunteer service to people.

lenders.name: Carrie
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I write articles and other content for websites and magazines.

lenders.name: Nan
lenders.loan_because: This gift was made to honor a woman who has devoted her life to helping those who are less fortunate obtain the resources and skills needed to achieve their dreams and care for their loved ones.  Keep up the great work Nan!

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Juli
lenders.loan_because:
There is always time to help, and Kiva lets me keep that in perspective.  

Today I helped a 22 year old woman buy rice seeds for the same price I would pay for a lunch out with friends.  There is always room to give.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage an insurance agency in Phoenix Arizona.

lenders.name: Rebeccah & Justin
lenders.loan_because: It is a practical way for us to help other people.
lenders.occupational_info: Rebeccah is a teacher for the Catholic Church, Justin helps corporations make deals.

lenders.name: Pagh family
lenders.loan_because:
It is one small thing we can do to make the world a little bit better, I hope.

Also we think it is important to show our two small girls that helping others is something we all should do, also when the one needing help is on the other side of the world.

And it is fun!

lenders.name: Erin and Mikelle
lenders.loan_because: Our global economy has distributed wealth unfairly and it is appropriate to assist those in countries that don't have the access to capital that we in the US enjoy. This loan model allows for accountability of funds and a chance to see good done firsthand.
lenders.occupational_info: Erin sells houses, Mikelle teaches.
